title: Is the CPR Mannequin Modeled After the Inventor’s Deceased Daughter?
subtitle: Many CPR students have been taught to check if a patient is unconscious by gently shaking the doll and calling, "Annie, are you OK?" But was there once a real "Annie"?
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: The face of the CPR training mannequin was modeled after the deceased daughter of the doctor who invented it.
